info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 11:14PM CDT until May 02 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Brown County in west central Texas... Northwestern San Saba County in west central Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1114 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Indian Creek, or 9 miles northeast of Elm Grove, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Brown and northwestern San Saba Counties, including the following locations... Indian Creek. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
